##Vectors in R

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")
marmots

```

```{r}
class(marmots)
```

```{r} 
#create and store the vector 
pika <- c(12.4,6.8,2.9,8.8,5)
pika
```

```{r}
class(pika)
```
```{r}
#create the integer vector
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)
bear
```

```{r}
class(bear)
```

```{r}
ringtail <- c(4.3,8.9,2.6,7.1)
fox<- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)
ringtail + fox
```

```{r}
#subtract
fox - ringtail
```
```{r}
#scalar multiplier
100 * ringtail
```
```{r}
#dot product
ringtail %*% fox
```
